data: “The last day of October!” said the Sun to himself,—“the last day of my favorite month, and the birthday of my little namesake! See if I don’t make the most of it!”
"The last day of October!" said the Sun to himself,--"the last day of my favorite month, and the birthday of my little namesake! See if I don't make the most of it!"
